title: Machine Learning Ops Engineer (MSO)
summary: Our ever-evolving suite of Heath and Wellness products for iPhone and Watch are helping our users live more active, healthier lives. Be ready to make something great when you come here. Dynamic, inspiring people and innovative, industry-defining technologies are the norm at Apple. The people who work here have reinvented and defined entire industries with our products and services. The same dedication to innovation also applies to our business practices - strengthening our commitment to leave the world better than we found it. AC Wellness Network LLC is a subsidiary of Apple Inc. and is the dedicated management services organization (MSO) for AC Wellness, a dedicated independent medical group that serves Apple Wellness Centers in Santa Clara Valley. Our mission is to deliver the world’s best healthcare experiences for Apple employees. The Health Special Projects MSO team is looking for an extraordinary ML Ops Engineer with a background in large scale engineering projects. You will enjoy building services that Data Science and Application developers will leverage to shape exceptional experiences for our employees and customers.
description: An ML Ops Engineer would help our Data Science team collect metrics around model performance as well as do rapid experimentation while also supporting some Data Engineering tasks to aid the Data Science team in tracking and analyzing results. You are ready to solve big problems, enjoy working in an agile and dynamic multi-functional team, love data, and want to make a huge impact in health. Some of your characteristics include: -  Experience building highly available and fault tolerant systems -  Experience with software development tools on Linux  -  Understands and can implement the lifecycle of ML development  -  Experience with ML Experimentation tools and workflows -  Proven track record of shipping services in production environments for consumer facing products -  Experience managing performance, application and security log management -  Strong coding experience and capable of picking up new languages -  Strong analytical thinking to solve challenging problems -  Excellent communication and collaboration skills -  Excellent problem solving and analytical thinking skills
key_qualifications: 5+ years experience designing and implementing modular, composable services, using state-of-the-art technology stacks; 1+ years of experience Collecting and Analyzing ML performance metrics; 2+ years working on highly available, high-volume, low latency services at scale; 2+ years working in AWS w/ container services (preferred experience in k8s).; Preferred Experience Airflow in AWS; Preferred Experience in Go, Java or Kotlin
education_experience: BS, MS, or PhD in Computer Science, or equivalent experience
additional_requirements: -  Experience handling Pen Testing and Secure Applications is a plus -  Works well in and across teams -  Works well in a self directed environment -  Comfortable with weekly on-call rotation -  Reliable and responsive to support the team’s needs -  Nice to have experience handling Pen Testing and Secure Applications - This is a site-based role
pay_benefits: At Apple, base pay is one part of our total compensation package and is determined within a range. This provides the opportunity to progress as you grow and develop within a role. The base pay range for this role is between $175,800 and $264,200, and your base pay will depend on your skills, qualifications, experience, and location. Apple employees also have the opportunity to become an Apple shareholder through participation in Apple’s discretionary employee stock programs. Apple employees are eligible for discretionary restricted stock unit awards, and can purchase Apple stock at a discount if voluntarily participating in Apple’s Employee Stock Purchase Plan. You’ll also receive benefits including: Comprehensive medical and dental coverage, retirement benefits, a range of discounted products and free services, and for formal education related to advancing your career at Apple, reimbursement for certain educational expenses — including tuition. Additionally, this role might be eligible for discretionary bonuses or commission payments as well as relocation. Learn more about Apple Benefits. Note: Apple benefit, compensation and employee stock programs are subject to eligibility requirements and other terms of the applicable plan or program.
